GameObject
Class StaticObject

java.lang.Object
  GameObject.GameObject
      GameObject.StaticObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bomb, BrickWall, ConcreteWall, Door, Flame, PowerUp
public class StaticObject
extends GameObject
implements java.io.Serializable

Defines the common functionality shared by all the objects that cannot move on the grid.

See Also:

isFirstCollision

public boolean isFirstCollision()
Determine whether the player is colliding with this StaticObject instance for the first time or not.

Returns:
A boolean representing whether this is the first time the player is colliding with StaticObject.

setFirstCollision

public void setFirstCollision(boolean firstCollision)
Specify whether the player is colliding with this StaticObject instance for the first time or not.

Parameters:
firstCollision - boolean representing whether the player object has collided with this StaticObject instance in the past or not.
